title: I Built a COPPER GOLEM Statue in Minecraft Hardcore (#54)
author: WadZee
description:
Today I Built a Copper Golem Statue in Minecraft Hardcore! Recently the Minecraft Mob Vote 2021 was held for the community to decide a new mob to be added to the game. My favourite mob, the Minecraft Copper Golem, unfortunately did not win. So I decided to build a GIANT Copper Golem in Minecraft so the copper golem's memory could live on forever! WHAT SHOULD I BUILD NEXT?

Build Inspiration: AnimalMace
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCH24ufNPog8Tn4zblgPeF8Q

★ Watch the series from episode 1:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U7z9MJwIFnY&list=PLXYjxAo4KISJqoE1rkt3OXmM5rCrstpoV

IF YOU ENJOYED THIS VIDEO, CHECK OUT THESE AS WELL:

▸I Built a SHULKER FARM in Minecraft Hardcore (#53)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xlGnh-sFkdg&t=12s

▸I Built a DRAGON in Minecraft Hardcore (#44)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bUAZvN_ROeA&t=7s
